name: identityProvider
description: A read-only attribute that contains information about the user's trusted identity provider.

subAttributes.name: id
subAttributes.description: An attribute containing the ID of the identity provider that is used as the authentication authority for the user. If present, the user must authenticate via this identity provider.

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A read-only attribute containing the type of the identity provider where the user account is managed. If the type is PING_ONE, PingOne is the authentication authority.
